languages.text: "Император защитит чад своих, несущих пламень очистительный. Слушайте рев пиломечей и рявканье авторужей, ибо в них зазвучит голос Его. Часто в проповедях своих я призываю офицеров к милосердию, но ныне говорю — не ведайте милости".

"May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"
languages.original_text: "Император защитит чад своих, несущих пламень очистительный. Слушайте рев пиломечей и рявканье авторужей, ибо в них зазвучит голос Его. Часто в проповедях своих я призываю офицеров к милосердию, но ныне говорю — не ведайте милости".

traits.locale_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach mercy to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and know no clemency."

"May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach mercy to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and know no clemency."

"May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

"May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

"May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

"May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

languages.text: « Que l'Empereur protège Ses enfants porteurs de Sa flamme purificatrice. Que rugissent les épées tronçonneuses et les fusils d'assaut, incarnations de Sa voix. Je prêche souvent la clémence envers nos nobles officiers, mais aujourd'hui je dis : abandonnez toute pitié ! »
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Empereur protège Ses enfants porteurs de Sa flamme purificatrice. Que rugissent les épées tronçonneuses et les fusils d'assaut, incarnations de Sa voix. Je prêche souvent la clémence envers nos nobles officiers, mais aujourd'hui je dis : abandonnez toute pitié ! »

languages.text: «Que el Emperador proteja a Sus hijos, que portan Su llama purificadora. Escuchad el rugido de las espadas sierra y el grito de los rifles automáticos, pues son Su voz. Suelo promover la clemencia ante nuestros nobles oficiales, pero ahora os digo: ¡dejadla a un lado y no mostréis piedad!».
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

traits.locale_text: «Que el Emperador proteja a Sus hijos, que portan Su llama purificadora. Escuchad el rugido de las espadas sierra y el grito de los rifles automáticos, pues son Su voz. Suelo promover la clemencia ante nuestros nobles oficiales, pero ahora os digo: ¡dejadla a un lado y no mostréis piedad!».

languages.text: “愿帝皇守护祂的子嗣，赐予他们净化的烈焰。聆听链锯剑的轰鸣与自动枪的怒吼吧，因为那便是祂的声音。我常向我们尊贵的军官传播仁慈的美德，但现在，我要对你们说：放下你们的仁慈吧！不要对敌人有一丝怜悯！”
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇守护祂的子嗣，赐予他们净化的烈焰。聆听链锯剑的轰鸣与自动枪的怒吼吧，因为那便是祂的声音。我常向我们尊贵的军官传播仁慈的美德，但现在，我要对你们说：放下你们的仁慈吧！不要对敌人有一丝怜悯！”

languages.text: 「皇帝が、その浄化の炎を伝える子供たちをお守りくださいますように。チェーンソードの轟音とオートガンの咆哮を聞いてください。これは、皇帝の声なのです。私はしばしば、気高い士官たちに慈悲を説いてきました。ですが、今あなた方にハッキリと言えます。憐れみを捨て、慈悲を示さないでください！」
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝が、その浄化の炎を伝える子供たちをお守りくださいますように。チェーンソードの轟音とオートガンの咆哮を聞いてください。これは、皇帝の声なのです。私はしばしば、気高い士官たちに慈悲を説いてきました。ですが、今あなた方にハッキリと言えます。憐れみを捨て、慈悲を示さないでください！」

languages.text: "Möge der Imperator seine Kinder beschützen, die seine läuternde Flamme in die Welt tragen. Höret das Brüllen der Kettenschwerter und das Schreien der Sturmgewehre, denn sie sind seine Stimme. Oft ermahne ich unsere edlen Offiziere, Milde walten zu lassen, doch nun sage ich Euch: Legt Euer Mitgefühl ab, zeigt keine Gnade!"
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Imperator seine Kinder beschützen, die seine läuternde Flamme in die Welt tragen. Höret das Brüllen der Kettenschwerter und das Schreien der Sturmgewehre, denn sie sind seine Stimme. Oft ermahne ich unsere edlen Offiziere, Milde walten zu lassen, doch nun sage ich Euch: Legt Euer Mitgefühl habt, zeigt keine Gnade!"

languages.text: "İmparator, arındırıcı alevini taşıyan çocuklarını korusun. Motorlu kılıçların kükremesine ve ototüfeklerin feryadına kulak verin. Onlar, O'nun sesidir. Asil subaylarımıza sıklıkla merhametin önemini anlatmışımdır ama şu an söyleyeceğim şey şu: Acıma duygunuzu bir kenara bırakın ve merhamet göstermeyin!"
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor protect His children who carry forth His cleansing flame. Hear the roar of chainswords and the bellow of autoguns, for they are His voice. Oft do I preach clemency to our noble officers, but this I say to you now: lay aside pity and show no mercy!"
